entry.title: 新的诞生
entry.content:
本博客的诞生

这个博客说实话，多少有些来之不易，经过两天的坚持不懈、四处摸索，也是完成了这个博客的搭建

  • 你们可能会问道，为什么要搭建这个博客

<-> 一开始的决定，本是打算把自己初学的 C 相关的代码放在博客上，但后来在搭建的过程中，对博客有了些了解，便决定将这个博客作为自己分享自己学习的过程与学习成果的平台。

  • 未来对这个博客有什么打算

<-> 自己会坚持把他维护下去，虽然技术不好，但也会尽全力

<-> 有了新的学习成功也会尽快分享到这个博客

  • 最后有什么想说的吗

<-> 不仅对这个博客，也是对自己所说

就像是初学代码时第一个程序那样

entry.title: Homework-temporary
entry.content:
Homework

homework

 #define _CRT_INTERNAL_SCANF_LEGACY_WIDE_SPECIFIERS 
 #include<stdio.h>
 #define Otsuki 31
 #define Satsuki 30
 #define Group 1,826//1闰年+3平年
 //#define L_Feb 29
 //#define A_Feb 28
 //#define Leap 366
 //#define Average 365
 
 void menu()
 {
     printf("Calculate the time difference between two dates.");
 }
 
 int operation()
 {
     int year_1, mouth_1, day_1, total_1, fab_1;
     int year_2, mouth_2, day_2, total_2, fab_2;
     int storange_1 = 0,storange_2=0;//记录第一年到年底天数，第二年到年初天数
     printf("Please in put the first date:(Format:Year/Mouth/Day)");
     scanf("&d/&d/&d", &year_1, &mouth_1, &day_1);
     getchar();
     printf("Please in put the second data:(Format:Year/Mouth/Day)");
     scanf("&d/&d/&d", &year_2, &mouth_2, &day_2);
     getchar();
 
     if (year_1 % 400 == 0 || year_1 % 4 == 0 && year_1 % 100 != 0)
     {
         fab_1 = 29;
         total_1 = 366;
     }
     else
     {
         fab_1 = 28;
         total_1 = 365;
     }
 
     if (year_2 % 400 == 0 || year_2 % 4 == 0 && year_2 % 100 != 0)
     {
         fab_2 = 29;
         total_2 = 366;
     }
     else
     {
         fab_2 = 28;
         total_2 = 365;
     }
 
     switch (mouth_1)
     {
     case 12:
     case 11:
         storange_1 = storange_1 + Otsuki;
     case 10:
         storange_1 = storange_1 + Satsuki;
     case 9:
         storange_1 = storange_1 + Otsuki;
     case 8:
         storange_1 = storange_1 + Otsuki;
     case 7:
         storange_1 = storange_1 + Satsuki;
     case 6:
         storange_1 = storange_1 + Otsuki;
     case 5:
         storange_1 = storange_1 + Satsuki;
     case 4:
         storange_1 = storange_1 + Otsuki;
     case 3:
         storange_1 = storange_1 + fab_1;
     case 2:
         storange_1 = storange_1 + Otsuki;
     case 1:
         storange_1 = day_1;
         storange_1 = total_1 - storange_1;
     }
 
     switch (mouth_2)
     {
     case 12:
     case 11:
         storange_2 = storange_2 + Otsuki;
     case 10:
         storange_2 = storange_2 + Satsuki;
     case 9:
         storange_2 = storange_2 + Otsuki;
     case 8:
         storange_2 = storange_2 + Otsuki;
     case 7:
         storange_2 = storange_2 + Satsuki;
     case 6:
         storange_2 = storange_2 + Otsuki;
     case 5:
         storange_2 = storange_2 + Satsuki;
     case 4:
         storange_2 = storange_2 + Otsuki;
     case 3:
         storange_2 = storange_2 + fab_2;
     case 2:
         storange_2 = storange_2 + Otsuki;
     case 1:
         storange_2 = day_2;
     }
     
     int count;
     count = year_2 - year_1 - 1;
 
 }
 
 int main()
 {
     menu();
     getchar();
 
     return 0;
 }
